main event: A C-47 type aircraft of the California Air National Guard observed a cigar-shaped object in the sky near Arlington, California on 11 July 1955.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 15 minutes by a military aircraft crew,The cigar-shaped object was metallic and silver in color with an estimated length of 75-100 ft,The object had no exhaust, fins, or wings,The witness was a student and ground observer with a background in amateur astronomy, The sighting was related to a report under Project Blue Book.
witness description: LT COL AKIN and 3 other crew members of the California Air National Guard
